meanings.sent1: The tablecloth felt lineny to the touch.
meanings.sent2: She wore a lineny dress to the summer picnic.
meanings.sent3: The lineny curtains fluttered in the breeze like gentle clouds.
meanings.sent4: The morning mist had a lineny softness that enveloped the valley.
meanings.sent5: The lineny texture of the fabric reminded her of a cozy blanket.

meanings.sent1: His lineny shirt kept him cool in the hot weather.
meanings.sent2: The lineny napkins added an elegant touch to the dinner table.
meanings.sent3: She joked that his lineny pants were like wearing a breathable cloud.
meanings.sent4: The lineny bed sheets felt like sleeping on a gentle breeze.
meanings.sent5: The lineny blend of the fabric made it perfect for summer attire.

meanings.sent1: The lineny table was set beautifully for the dinner party.
meanings.sent2: The lineny walls of the room gave it a cozy feel.
meanings.sent3: The lineny chair covers added a touch of elegance to the room.
meanings.sent4: The lineny drapes framed the window like a soft embrace.
meanings.sent5: The lineny decorations created a warm and inviting atmosphere.
